page.title: 12HOUSES AND BUILDINGS.
page.content: Around the Thornton area there are lots of old{barns.}Most of these are made of stone,but just a few of them are made of wood or have timber frames.Most of the{houses}in Thornton are old,but some of them are modern. The old houses were built in 1720,but they were rebuilt in the early 19th Century.Around the area there are also lots of{farms,}either in use or abandoned.They are made of stone with timber frames.Next to Hyde Lane Farm there is a sewage building,but is the only one in the area.Places of storage are also numerous such as barns or disused cattle sheds.There were also remains of a{Roman Villa,}but they are not standing any more because a Farmhouse has been built on the site.All the Farmhouses have thick stone walls. { }
